subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: John Tavares and Anders Lee scored 12 seconds apart in the third period, and the Islanders defeated the Tampa Bay Lightning, 3-1, with a comeback at Nassau Coliseum.
snippet: John Tavares and Anders Lee scored 12 seconds apart in the third period, and the Islanders defeated the Tampa Bay Lightning, 3-1, with a comeback at Nassau Coliseum.
